item.title: 과적차량 위반 카메라 시스템 - LPR, VMS
item.description: 과적 차량에 대한 번호 인식 및 VMS 영상녹화 프로그램 환경 : Windows, .net framework, C#, WPR 기술 : OCR, Bosch Camera, LPR 고객 : 국토관리부

item.title: Linked post
item.description: I’m a linked post in the menu. You can add other posts by adding the following line to the frontmatter: menu = "main" Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. item.title: Creating a new themeAAA
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will show you how to create a simple theme in Hugo. I assume that you are familiar with HTML, the bash command line, and that you are comfortable using Markdown to format content. I’ll explain how Hugo uses templates and how you can organize your templates to create a theme. I won’t cover using CSS to style your theme. We’ll start with creating a new site with a very basic template.

I’ll explain how Hugo uses templates and how you can organize your templates to create a theme. I won’t cover using CSS to style your theme. We’ll start with creating a new site with a very basic template.
